summary: "Mi chiesero se avessero dovuto proclamare un nuovo re. Sapevo cosa intendevano. Sarebbe stato mio padre o Robert Baratheon, o...
body:
“Mi chiesero se avessero dovuto proclamare un nuovo re. Sapevo cosa intendevano. Sarebbe stato mio padre o Robert Baratheon, o forse il bambino Viserys che era fuggito a Roccia del Drago? Un re-bambino Targaryen con mio padre Primo Cavaliere con il vero comando. Mi chiedo come Ned Stark e Robert Baratheon avrebbero reagito a questo finale della loro eroica guerra, e fui tentato.

"Proclamate chi cazzo vi pare” dissi. Salii i gradini del Trono di Spade e mi sedetti con la mia spada sulle ginocchia, aspettando di vedere chi sarebbe arrivato a reclamare il regno.“

Poi guardai Aerys a terra, il suo sangue che sgorgava dalla ferita e formava una pozza sul pavimento.

blog.name: naomimakesart
blog.title: My Artistic Domain
blog.description:
Naomi | She/Her | 24 | 🌞♉️| 🌜♑️| INFP | Hobbyist & Freelancer | Movie-Buff | Loves Critical Role, DnD, Tolkien, Game of Thrones| Gryffindor| TARGARYEN LOYALIST| This is my art blog! Sometimes I post original drawings, but this is all mostly fanart.
Please do NOT use, repost/copy/reproduce/trace, color, edit, publish, or distribute my art!

summary:
grumpycat69
 replied to your post  “Cregan Stark can get it ANY DAY, ANY TIME, ANY DAY: conclusion - you...”
                   ...
body:
grumpycat69 replied to your post

“Cregan Stark can get it ANY DAY, ANY TIME, ANY DAY: conclusion - you…”

There’s a list? Who are the others?

@grumpycat69 OH NO I’VE EXPOSED MYSELF

THE LIST IS AS FOLLOWS, WITH NO PARTICULAR ORDER:

  • Alys Rivers (solo this time) in the godswood of Harrenhall, naked and preggers
  • Grandpa Aegon Targaryen crying with baby Rhaena in his arms
  • Aegon III and Viserys II tearful reunion
  • Visenya and Maegor on Visenya’s Hill challenging anyone who objected to Maegor’s rule 
  • Jaehaerys kissing Alysanne on Dragonstone in front of everybody (that iconic kiss writ about in songs) 
  • The bargain made between Black Alys and Cregan Stark
  • Visenya slicing Aegon across the cheek 
  • Daemon with his four children, bc he’s my favorite daddy ™
  • Maegor and ALL OF HIS WIVES (this is a tall order but still)
  • Daemon reading Rhaenyra love poems and being charming af
  • Alysanne and Jaehaerys right after she gives birth to Daenerys 
  • Viserys and Dany living on the streets in the Free Cities 
  • at some point I wanted to draw concepts of all the dragon riders and their dragons (also a HUGE tall order, but if I can manage to get concepts of at least the dragons down I’d be happy)
  • Daemon Blackfyre teaching Bloodraven swordplay
  • Baela and Alyn 
  • Sandoq the Shadow defending Aegon and Viserys
  • Eventually Dunk and Egg
  • Also have several WIPs of Bloodraven and Shiera that are sitting in my folder just dusty rn

This is the main list for now. However this list is subject to change, depending on whether I have the energy to do only some or any of these drawings at all. I like setting goals for myself because I can usually complete a majority of the things I’d like to draw (I’ve already done several of the drawings I wanted to do for F&B this month). Last year I had a list of Silmarillion artwork that I’d like to do and I almost finished the entire thing except I didn’t draw a series of concepts of the Valar and Valier. 

Mayhaps for my New Years resolution I can set this as a goal for myself, to complete at least half if not more of this list! The list may grow however as I am trying to reread ASOIAF currently and ideas for new drawings may pop up as I read through the old stuff. lol Suggestions for the list are appreciated (as long as they concern House Targaryen in some way), but I make no promises that I’ll be able to draw any because sometimes I just don’t have the inspiration/motivation. They still make me smile though! 

Hope yall enjoy; don’t hold your breath, because I can be a huge disappointment sometimes, just ask my mother.

summary: [Spoilers] Which is the worst death on the show?
title: [Spoilers] Which is the worst death on the show?
body:
Call me a noob, but, on the show, I consider Maester Luwin to be the most shocking death, and also one of the saddest. It was completely unnecessary, incredibly cruel, and done by one of my favorite actors. It blows my mind to think that the Starks eventually took back Winterfell after this character’s symbolic demise.



Source: http://bit.ly/2AcUnaR

summary:
Daenerys x Drogo: Christmas AU 
I found, what I was looking for
A love that's meant for me
A heart that's mine...
body:
Daenerys x Drogo: Christmas AU

I found, what I was looking for

A love that’s meant for me

A heart that’s mine completely

Knocked me right off my feet

And this year I will fall

With no worries at all

‘Cause you are near and everything’s clear

You’re all I need

Underneath the tree

answer: Not off the top of my head. Sorry! Hopefully some of my mutuals or those that fit this description can let us know in the replies??
